title: SnozzlePro Universal Hair Dryer Nozzle Adapter - Fits Xtava Black Orchid Diffuser, Replacement Concentrators and Blow Dryers with a Diameter 1.5 Inch to 2.25 Inch - Prevents Attachment Pop-Offs
features: FITS MOST HAIR DRYERS: Made of 100% industrial-strength silicone, SnozzlePro is flexible, durable, and fits most hair dryers with a nozzle diameter measuring 1.5" to 2.25". Please measure and confirm your hair dryer nozzle diameter BEFORE purchase.
FITS XTAVA BLACK ORCHID HAIR DIFFUSER: SnozzleProâ€™s super-tight fit on the Xtava Black Orchid Hair Diffuser is designed to grip and support the added weight of this short nozzle hair diffuser.
PREVENTS CONCENTRATOR NOZZLE POP-OFFS: SnozzlePro's patented design keeps hair dryer concentrator nozzles securely attached for a perfect fit and protects hands from heat.

HOW TO USE - SnozzlePro comes with detailed HOW-TO-USE instructions. Please follow these instructions carefully before use. Diffuse on low to medium heat at low speed. Do not use high heat setting or high speed.

PRO TIPS: Clean SnozzlePro with dishwashing liquid to remove hair product residue and restore its grip as needed. DYSON HAIR DRYER USERS: Insert the Dyson "Smoothing" nozzle ONLY HALFWAY into the larger end of the SnozzlePro. (Over-inserting the nozzle will cause the diffuser to detach.)
